reporter_caption.center: NADDY v. PIPER JAFFRAY INC., 88 Wn. App. 1033 (1997)

caption.center: JOHN NADDY, ET AL., APPELLANTS, v. PIPER JAFFRAY, INCORPORATED, RESPONDENT.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Three.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeals from a judgment of the Superior Court for Spokane County, No. 95-2-05882-0, Michael E. Donohue and Robert D. Austin, JJ., entered December 29, 1995 and March 22, 1996.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part, reversed in part and remanded by unpublished opinion per Brown, J., concurred in by Schultheis, A.C.J., and Kurtz, J.
